trekkingPackages.name: Mountain Adventure Trek
trekkingPackages.description: Explore the stunning Himalayan mountains on a 10-day trekking adventure. Witness breathtaking landscapes, visit remote villages, and experience the thrill of high-altitude trekking.

trekkingPackages.name: Jungle Safari Trek
trekkingPackages.description: Embark on a 7-day jungle safari trek through the Amazon Rainforest in Brazil. Encounter diverse wildlife, explore lush forests, and camp under the canopy.

trekkingPackages.name: Desert Expedition Trek
trekkingPackages.description: Experience the ultimate desert adventure with a 14-day trek through the Sahara Desert in Morocco. Traverse vast dunes, visit ancient oases, and sleep under the starry desert sky.

trekkingPackages.name: Alpine Explorer Trek
trekkingPackages.description: Embark on a 12-day alpine adventure in the Swiss Alps. Hike through picturesque landscapes, summit stunning peaks, and enjoy breathtaking views of the Swiss countryside.
